articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Rocket Lab launches new NASA solar sail tech to orbit (video, photos) - Space.com
articles.description: It was the second liftoff in a 16-minute span today (April 23), after a SpaceX Starlink launch.
articles.content:
Rocket Lab launched a South Korean Earth-observation satellite and new NASA solar-sailing tech to orbit this evening (April 23).
The agency's Advanced Composite Solar Sail System, or ACS3 for short,… [+3793 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft's Phi-3 shows the surprising power of small, locally run AI language models - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft’s 3.8B parameter Phi-3 may rival GPT-3.5, signaling a new era of “small language models."
articles.content:
